tags: wow there are many characters and movies i can't put all that in tags
body:
Thank you, Stan Lee

7 years ago, I started loving Spider Man for reasons that don’t matter in this narrative; later on, I found out that Robert Downey Jr. played Iron Man…and as I loved him, I watched his movie…and the next one, and then, I watched Captain America: The First Avenger…

And I emabarked on this journey that is watching and loving the MCU and the rest of the films and shows that derived from Marvel comics. I was a bit late, but I’m sure that doesn’t matter much because for seven years, I’ve found my happiness in a universe that is not only wonderful, but has helped me through my toughest days. I cannot imagine my life without Marvel in it, without the movies, shows, and actors I’ve grown to love and admire.

I’m unable to put into words how Marvel is part of my everyday life, how nearly anything I see related to it brightens up my day, and how it has inspired to write and become a better writer.

Loving these characters played by such marvelous actors, in such incredible films, has changed my life. It showed me that maybe my world isn’t that good, but that world can make me smile when I refuse to. I cannot say I’ve read the comics, hell, that would be a different story to tell, but because those comics exist, the MCU has been a group of glorious motion pictures that have been an engine to my life for many years now. And so, I am so thankful for Stan Lee’s life and legacy, for it is one that marked my life and many others’ and it will live for ever.

I’m unable to put into words how Marvel is part of my everyday life, how nearly anything I see related to it brightens up my day, and how it has inspired to write and become a better writer.

blog.name: waspwidow
blog.title: with great power comes no future
blog.description: i used to have nothing. and then i got this job...this family. and it made me better. and now they're gone, and i'm still trying to be better. - eliza, she/they, icon by bigstarkenergy.

body:
may parker headcanons

  • she’s trans and bi, baby
  • fucking amazing at making flower crowns
  • (she taught peter how to make them too)
  • she loves flowers but every plant she’s tried to grow died
  • i can’t remember if she has a canon job but. if she doesn’t i’m saying she’s a nurse
  • never really thought she was going to have kids, but she’s glad she got to raise peter because she absolutely adores him
  • such a lightweight
  • speaks spanish almost fluently
  • her cooking isn’t the best but she does like to bake sometimes when she gets the chance
  • loves dancing! she’s not very good at it but she dances anyways and her lack of fucks about what people thought did a lot to help peter learn that other people’s opinions don’t matter as much as he thinks
  • she laughs at her own jokes a lot and they’re always stupid jokes but it’s literally impossible to see her laugh without joining in
  • she doesn’t like violence but she 10/10 would throw down for peter
  • helps out at a nearby center for lgbtq youth when she can, they all love her because she’s just,,so soft and nice
  • seen all the star wars movies with peter more than once, she doesn’t like them much but her yoda voice is incredible
  • harry potter nerd
  • hufflepuff
  • hates white chocolate with a burning passion, loves dark chocolate
  • trash for sponge candy
  • she and tony meet up sometimes to drink wine and be bi disasters
  • they’re really good friends okay
  • fucking terrified of clowns
  • she doesn’t go all out for pride, but she does go to the parade every year and loves meeting new people when she’s there
  • her fashion style is just whatever’s clean that day
  • either watches rom coms or horror movies, depends on her mood
  • would die for birthday cake ice cream
  • y'all know her celebrity crush is black widow
  • does random accents all the time,
  • like she’ll be in the middle of a conversation with peter and then she’ll say a fancy word with a british accent and then just. use the accent for the next hour because she honestly forgot she was doing it
  • loves doctor who
  • also very gay for the thirteenth doctor
  • basically may’s a bi icon
  • we stan a legend

blog.name: freshthoughts2020
blog.title: THE MOST IMPORTANT BLOG ON PLANET EARTH

body:
Concept

Tom Holland’s Spider-Man is great and awesome and amazing and perfect. No, he is not like the comics. No, he is not like the other Spider-Man’s. That is fine. No one Spider-Man is just like the others. He is perfect the way he is, his story is perfect the way it is, and I cannot wait to see him grow and blossom and become even more amazing. He lives up to the image and legacy that Stan Lee the Legendary created for him.

Alternatively, he is not my favorite Spider-Man. I already got mine but they cut his show too soon and now I wanna punch whoever decided to cut it. That does not mean that I will not love and protect an cheer and defend this Spider-Man to my last breath. Spider-Man is perfect, flaws and all, and no one can change my mind.

Fangirl out.

summary: Stan Lee | The Hero Who Created The Most Loved Superheroes.
title: Stan Lee | The Hero Who Created The Most Loved Superheroes.
excerpt: A blog about all the things that make your life better.
description: The heroes you created taught me to accept people for who they are. They were not only an entertainment, but a way of showing me to be a better person. You have a great impact on who I am today. Thank you for everything Stan Lee.

reblog.comment: The heroes you created taught me to accept people for who they are. They were not only an entertainment, but a way of showing me to be a better person. You have a great impact on who I am today. Thank you for everything Stan Lee.

title: 15 Curiosidades sobre Stan Lee
body:
15 Curiosidades sobre Stan Lee

El 12 de Noviembre de 2018 falleció uno de los iconos del mundo del cómic, Stan Lee, a los 95 años. Él hombre que aporto mucho a la industria del entretenimiento y la cultura popular, por que su trabajo en Marvel es conocido a lo largo del mundo.

Son pocas personas los que no conocen a Stan Lee o algún personaje suyo, sin embargo, tal vez hay datos interesantes que no sabías de él. ¿Alguna vez te…

summary: Peter: I'm the most responsible person in this family.Stephen: Didn't you set your bathroom on fire yesterday?Peter: There was a...
body:
Peter: I’m the most responsible person in this family.

Stephen: Didn’t you set your bathroom on fire yesterday?

Peter: There was a spider!

Peter: There was a spider!
trail.content:
Peter: I’m the most responsible person in this family.

Stephen: Didn’t you set your bathroom on fire yesterday?

Peter: There was a spider!
